paint(Graphics) - Method in class game.Borders
 
paint(Graphics) - Method in class game.GameObject
Paints the object on the screen.
play() - Method in class menu.Sound
Play the sound clip
player() - Method in class game.Main
The method for setting up the player.
Player - Class in game
The class for the functionality of the players where it controls how the player is moving where it contains the up, down, left, and right key detection.
Player() - Constructor for class game.Player
 
playerHealth() - Method in class game.Main
The health detection for the player when it collides with any type of zombies.
playerLocation() - Method in class game.Main
This method allows for the zombie to get the location of the player.
playerLocation() - Method in class game.ZombieMovement
The method for where it detects the player location in the game.
playerMovement() - Method in class game.Main
The movement detection for player when WASD keys are pressed with a final speed.
playerX(int) - Method in class game.ZombieMovement
Sets up for the x position of the player and detection by the zombies
playerY(int) - Method in class game.ZombieMovement
Sets up for the y position of the player and detection by the zombies
Popup - Class in menu
The class that controls the pop ups for the small JFrames, this includes the Instructions, BackStory, GameOver, and Scoreboard classes.
Popup() - Constructor for class menu.Popup
The default constructor for the popups.
